Html:
i have got a report that has a date entry which loooks like

                     date                                          duration
            2008/10/1 04:33:53                           00:02:33
            2008/10/1 12:44:33                           00:01:23

so i need to split the date entry into date date and time and i also need to sum up the durations

like

                   date                               time                  durations
              2008/10/1                         04:33:53            00:02:33
              2008/10/1                         12:44:33            00:01:23
                                                                            total = 00: 03:56

thnx for ideas...

This is a great question for the T-SQL forum. http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/forums/en-US/transactsql/threads/

Check out DATEPART and CAST/CONVERT in Books Online for ideas about how to query the same column multiple times with different formats.
